ej,raded103,P,varge901,Interference non-call (Umpire struck by throw) $3B umpire Ed Vargo was struck by the throw from the outfield; the ball caromed off Vargo's leg towards the dugout, allowing Johnny Bench to score; Doug Rader complained that Vargo interfered with the play and that Bench should not be allowed to score; Rader was ejected by Vargo; fans threw trash onto the field and Vargo threatened to forfeit the game if they did not stop

$Doug Rader slid into Kevin Collins and hit Collins on the face with an elbow; after Collins was carried off, a fight broke out; several players were punched but no one was ejected; Collins suffered a severely bruised right cheekbone
$Jim Ray tried to bunt the first pitch but the ball struck his finger
$Matty Alou fouled the second pitch off his face, opening a cut under his left eye; he left on a stretcher
